attributes.title: Worst App Ever Made
attributes.review: This app is horrible! It took so many hours to download and it gives false information! I only trust reliable sources, this was NOT one of them. This app was extremely slow and gave me several viruses on my phone! How could anyone let this happen! This app is so conservative, it made me want to move to Canada! DISGUSTING. I will NOT be downloading this app or sharing this with ANYONE. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. IT WILL MAKE YOU VOMIT. 😡

attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review: immediately upon opening this app i got 27 different viruses on my mobile device. i could not do ANYTHING about it and so my phone completely reset, so now all my pictures of my friends dad i was going to use to make a tiktok are gone. 0/10 would NOT recommend especially because i no longer support that orange man because of this app.

attributes.title: Do not download (mental health ⚠️)
attributes.review: Once I opened the app I saw a Cheeto not even a hot Cheeto a nasty orange Cheeto dust thing on my screen it was so awful. All these boomers saying it’s a 5 star like are they on crack or something because I’m pretty sure that’s a illegal. Long story short it’s a waste of space. But if you download this app I thing you should check yourself into a mental hospital because I am very worried for your mental health.

attributes.title: This app almost killed me 🤬
attributes.review: I was so excited to download this app but all the excitement went away when it took a whole day to download 😡 when it finished I was thrown off a building by 2 guys then jumped by 13 people an hour later 😥 when I went to the doctor they told me they had to cut off my arms 😞 so now I had to type this terrible review with my feet

attributes.title: VERY BAD EXPERIENCE
attributes.review: this app DOES NOT work please save yourself and do not download. the 🍊 has once again wasted my time and i am done. this app broke my phone and completely cursed me. i am now haunted by the souls of nasty sewer rats that eat ALL OF MY FOOD. i have no idea how to undo this and if anyone has any advice please help. i’m telling u it’s not worth the trouble and u will immediately regret downloading this piece of absolute garbage.

attributes.title: ive seen it ive seen the cheeto puff
attributes.review: I got this app thinking it was tik tok because of the big T and now that orange Cheeto is trowing microwaves at me yelling im a pervert  and im going to build a wall around you so I tried to run away and ran into what i thought was one off his wall turns out it was his big built like thanos looking like a punkin belly hanging out of his shirt now I have to drink bleach 87 times and hour just to forget about it

attributes.title: very bad
attributes.review: it took DAYS to download and when it finally downloaded my phone was glitching,also  when i told my family i wanted to support my president me  by downloading it they disowned me😪 so now i’m homeless and i can’t even use the app!! 😡 and my screen cracked as soon as i tried to open it 🙃 very bad luck to have this app on your phone take it from me ‼️‼️

attributes.title: this app is the devil
attributes.review: this app is so terrible, ever since i’ve downloaded it i’ve been hearing voices and i’ve had urges to do horrible things. it’s all because of the app, i can hear it calling my name at night whispering things like “make America great again.” and it sends shivers down my spine. i’m pretty sure the horse that’s in the hospital is responsible for all this. a horse should NOT be in the hospital.

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: I wanted to download this app to support out wonderful 🧚🏻‍♀️👑orange ✨💫 president. Wow does he have a tan 🥕🍑🍊. Anyways the app literally took like an hour and a half to download and I am an inpatient person. When I finally opened it, it wouldn’t load and it kept crashing!!! I do have good WiFi and it’s stable and high quality however this just wouldn’t work. Had to delete it. Oh well 😔 🧚🏻‍♀️💫✨
